SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
CSCEngine
The CSCEngine class represents the engine of a Canadian Surface Combatant (CSC) ship.
CSCGun
This class represents a gun that can be equipped on a CSC (Canadian Surface Combatant) ship.
CSCShip
This class represents a Canadian Surface Combatant ship that extends the abstract class Ship.
CSCShipFactory
A concrete factory class that creates a set of weapons and engines for the Canadian Surface Combatant ship.
Engine
Interface representing the engine of a ship.
HCEngine
HCEngine represents the engine used in Halifax Class ships.
HCGun
The HCGun class represents a type of weapon used in the Halifax-class ships.
HCShip
The HCShip class extends the abstract Ship class and represents a specific type of ship called the Halifax Class ship.
HCShipFactory
This class implements the ShipFactory interface and provides the implementation for creating the Halifax Class ship.
Ship
The abstract class Ship represents a generic ship with a name, a weapon, and an engine.
ShipBuilding
The abstract class ShipBuilding represents the abstract factory pattern for creating Canadian ships.
ShipFactory
An interface that defines methods to create different components for a ship.
ShipFactroryTest
This is a test class for the ShipFactory system.
SurfaceShipBuilding
Creates a specific type of Canadian surface ship based on the input parameter, typeOfShip.
Weapon
